title: Rectify partner name to Poonam Punamiya

requirements.summary: Update the partner name in the Partners component from the current incorrect spelling to 'Poonam Punamiya' in the static partners data array
acceptanceCriteria: The Partners section displays the name 'Poonam Punamiya' exactly as specified.
No other partner names or data are altered.
The partner card for Poonam Punamiya renders correctly with all existing details (photo, designation, specializations, experience) intact.

file_operations.description: Update the partner name field for Poonam Punamiya to the correct spelling 'Poonam Punamiya' in the static partners data array. Locate the partner object that contains the incorrect spelling and update only the name property to 'Poonam Punamiya', leaving all other properties (designation, specialization, experienceYears, image) unchanged.
